traits.name: Arcane Sight
traits.desc: Elusa hounds can perceive magical auras from active spells, magical effects, and magic items within a radius of 120 feet. Once an elusa hound has seen one of the above, it has advantage on Wisdom (Survival) checks to track the origin of the effect for 24 hours.

traits.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
traits.desc: The elusa hound has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 11 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone and grappled. The elusa hound can only grapple one creature at a time.
